name: Trainee Deity Appeasement Admin
description:
Can you appease the Gods by making the correct sacrifice? Do they like wine? Sausages? Kale? What about pleasing five Gods simultaneously? Balance the deities mad whims and do your best as the new Trainee Deity Appeasement Admin!

This game was made as a result of the Guildford Game Jammers Global Game Jam 2016 entry. To join a Guildford game jam, visit this page: https://www.facebook.com/groups/486374098214833/
